Description:
Live, Love And Entertain!
Presenting a charming traditional style facade and well maintained interiors, this family home is centrally located to enjoy the best of three locales; Clarinda, Clayton and Clayton South. Walking distance to Namatjira Park, Bald Hill Park, Clarinda Shopping Centre, St Andrew's School, Clayton South Primary School and bus services as well as just minutes to Clayton Shopping Plaza, Clayton Aquatics and Health Club, Monash Hospital, Clayton Train Station and so much more!
Situated at the front of the property is the first living space with warm timber style flooring and modern downlights. Continue through to the heart of the home and you will find an open plan kitchen and meals area with direct access to the pergola for extended entertainment space. Comprising of durable slate flooring and classic black and white cabinetry, the kitchen offers plenty of cupboard storage space and convenient access to the laundry. Completing the living zones is an upstairs retreat, ideal for a rumpus room, theatre room or teenagers retreat.
The master bedroom, with not one but three built in robes, is accompanied by three additional bedrooms that share the dual access family bathroom with luxury shower and separate WC. Relax in comfort all year round with your choice of ducted heating, evaporative cooling, a reverse cycle air conditioner and ceilings fans.
Set on a corner block of approximately 533m2, there is plenty of space for entertaining, relaxing and off street parking. The pergola entertainment area flows on to the in ground, solar heated pool and gas heated spa with the eco-composite decking surround. A long garage provides secure parking with extra room for storage, a workshop or mancave whilst the lengthy driveway behind vehicle access gates adds extra parking for residents and visitors.
With so much to love be sure to inspect as soon as possible or call us today to make this fine family home your next move on the property ladder.
